reviews.review:
板倒してればサバイバーが逃げ切れるゲーム。
現環境に対応するにはよほどキラーをやる方の腕前が高くない限り、使えるキラーも限られます。
復帰勢キラーには現環境でプレーするのはおススメできません。
あなた方の知っているDBDではもうありません。

サバイバーは楽しいかもしれません。板倒してれば他のサバイバーが発電機回してくれますから。
昔のような両者緊張感のある試合は滅多にできません。

板の間隔短すぎ

It's very cool if you like the horror and suspense feeling and you just want spent short time to each game match. The rest of errors are funny sometimes and very known, the good new is thaey're working on them all the time.
เกมกระจอก ทำเกมไม่สมดุล เอาใจผู้รอดชีวิตเกินไป ปั่น20วิเสร็จ 3เครื่อง ฮัลโหลกูเเขวนได้ตัวเดียวไม่ทันเฟท2เลยมึงจะออกกันได้อยู่ละ ไม่น่าเสียความโง่เติมเกมแบบนี้เลย
Советую вам сыграть, по бегаете от убийцы, почините генераторы, будите помагать другим людям спастись. Сильно затягивает.
Got hooked real fast and I don't think I can wiggle free.

Honestly a must have game. i saw this for years in early access and thought it looked cool but didn't take the leap to buying it until much later. WAS THAT A MISTAKE! - if you're thinking about buying this (especially if you have friends to play it with) then do. maybe watch a few videos on how to play and some play tactics and warm up for a while playing matches and learning how to cooperate with your group or alternatively coordinate your kill strategy and go for it. once you've warmed up a bit and leveled up a bit the real enjoyment comes out. Its scary and cool and horrific for a while with new levels and killers but then it becomes more strategy and smart gameplay which in no way takes away from the enjoyment but adds to it when you escape by a hair on your own at the end of a match. And its always fun when they release new killers and maps which is pretty often. this game will be around for years to come for sure so don't worry about the servers still worth a buy in 2022-2023. my only downside is that it can take quite a while to matchmake 
 sometimes but its a sacrifice I'm willing to take.

Score: 8/10 

When the game first launched this game needed quite a bit of work but now, with the constant updates and content, this game is one of the best co-op survival games out there.
Finding a game in 2022 is a fucking joke. 20 minutes couldnt find a game. Take your money elsewhere unless you dont mind wait in the menu for half an hour per match.
Boa pegada, belo ambiente e... bem, só consegui jogar 4 horas e nunca mais abri. Boa sorte.
the worst purchase ive ever made
No lo recomiendo por tu propia salud.

I am convinced around 60-70% of this gaming community has either mental issues or nothing but anger and hatred in them. Every match over turns into pure hate and rage over the slightest of things. 

But that is not the reason for the down vote. The down vote comes from the pay for grind to win this game is. It is a cool concept to have trainable skills from one character to give to the other characters. However I feel it becomes nothing but a grind to get these super perks and use them. Some of them being almost must haves. That is not to say you HAVE to use them. But you are nerfing yourself by not using them. 

The bloodpoint grind is not a bad system either but it really becomes a grind doing it for multiple characters over and over again. Especially on ones that are weak without specific perks to aid them. I understand most people enjoy this. But I would have prefered this game be a jump in and play kind of game and not a semi grind game for upgraded perks and talents. 

But you can have fun in it. All depends on how u decide to make the fun yourself. For me it is a no.
真香，贞子都来了还不冲么？

I play this game nearly every day with friends.

Такссс... Тепер моя черга висказати паро ласкових.
1. Рекомендую гру всім тим в кого стальні нерви  так як точно  після цього всього вони будуть нервно сидіти і курити 10 пачку сигар.
2. Якшо коротко  про гру (версія ман)  зайшов з гарним настроєм  вийшов з розбитой клавой, кривоватость текстур, перкі які зроблені щоб унижати манов  токсичні сурви і це ще мала часть всього треша!
3 (версія сурв) зайшол с хорошим настроєм - вийшов с повесткою до психолога  так как весь гемплей за сурва поділяється на норм ман і ман якій тунелить тебе і кемпить тобто зайшов тупо повисіти на крюку. А если ман і не тунелить то тут много других багов сломаних механик , якщо у мана поганий інтернет співчуваю це означає що він буде попадати по тобі завжди не важно встиг ти сховатися чи ні .
4. Про кросплей вообще молчу з консольками які крутяться як тот вертольот ще та біда но коли ти захотів відихнути від них , стає проблема що проти пк ігроков ти будиш сидіти чекати гру хв 40 не менше.
5. Основной гемпел  високих рангов це зайшов на карту тебе 100% першим находит ман ложить тебе  вішає і кемпить і так покругу всі ігри.
6. Комюніті ето та еще біда особливо рус ігрокі ( не всі но більшість) кожин 2 кемперить або тунелить  і потом пише що гра була простою а коли ти намагаєшся йому пояснити що кемперить це погано вони не слухаю хоча вони росіяни шо тут зробиш вони змалку зомбуються.
7. Манов ламаю но чинити їх вони не особливо  спішать так як в одній із попередніх обнов поламали мана якого не фіксили більше місяця хоча з останньою обновлю все стало як треба но баг всеодно ще неоднократно можга зловити.
8. Але впринципі  даже з усіма недостатками багами  токсичним комюніті це дуже цікава затягуючи гра особливо для компаній. Тут можна весело провести час такшо як говориться ласкаво просимо в ад.)
 10 кемперов із 10!

Killers get way too many unfair perks. 
They kill so easily, they "walk" faster than you running, they can one tap you easy with any characters 
They see you across the map even when you're walking or hiding in a locker
i liked playing this game but this game can def be way better, the perks that killers have can be a bit frustrating and overwhelming to survivors. 

If someone gets disconnected at the beginning of the game or in a game in general, the team should have at least more chance to get out. and also maybe something we can earn to not die so quickly on a hook. and whats the point of 3 times on the hook you die, or the killers can just kill you on site without hooking you. 

OR/AND 

when all the survivors are down and not on the hook, they should STILL be able to heal one another, or open a chest near them to help them have a bit more chance to win instead of favoring the whole game to the killers. 

overall, the game is frustrating, that's why not many people would play this game. or else id def play more if it was more of a "fair" game

You can give your friends nightmares

This game is horror smash bros, in the sense that it is a massive collection of characters from all across horror, including games, movies and folktales. However, this game has very inconsistent matchmaking and I have constantly been put in lobbies with players far higher than my own ranking. It also struggles from people abusing game mechanics to get an edge or camping players and exit doors. But hey, despite all of those flaws I still have a ton of fun playing this game so maybe you will as well.

jogo muito bom para se jogar com amigos
It's really fun if you play with friends!

The way this game works and its design is annoying and stupid. There is too much grinding for each character and with each new character added it makes it harder to lvl up them too and if you though of old players swimming in lvl up materials then you are imagining things. If you are saving them for an upcoming character good luck because apperantly they have a limit on how much you can have. The game is unbalanced with the way perks work  and how you unlock them. Also the way they force players to play both roles just for the chance of completing the battle pass, and giving them daily missions of the opposite role just so they have to try the opposite role of what they want to actually play is so annoying. Also there is no way to try any character before you unlock them, so if you want to unlock someone and then regret it you basically spend money or in game currency, that is already hard to gather, and time for nothing because there isnt any refund system in the game. The game has no casual mode so you are forced to play competitively on every game you are queuing for. Most of the new characters require you to spend real money, even tho you spend money to buy this game and lately they do realise mostly dlc characters.
